alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 9:30AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL HUMBOLDT COUNTY THROUGH 1000 AM PST... At 929 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near McKinleyville to 7 miles northwest of Fortuna. Movement was east at 30 mph. Minor urban or small stream flooding is possible due to the previous heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Arcata, Fortuna, McKinleyville, Westhaven-Moonstone, Ferndale, Myrtletown, Cutten, Humboldt Hill, Samoa, Arcata Arpt, Loleta, Fieldbrook, Pine Hills, Bayview, and Fernbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
